context: This evaluation assesses the engineer's proficiency in using the geocomplete jQuery plugin to implement a location search interface with map integration, draggable markers, and form population. The criteria focus exclusively on proper usage of geocomplete's API, configuration options, events, and methods.

checklist.name: Plugin initialization
checklist.description: Correctly initializes the geocomplete plugin on the search input element using $().geocomplete() with appropriate configuration options including map and details parameters

checklist.name: Map integration
checklist.description: Properly configures the map option to link the geocomplete input to the map container (e.g., map: '#map'), enabling automatic map centering and marker placement on geocode results

checklist.name: Form population
checklist.description: Correctly configures the details option to automatically populate form fields with geocoded address components (e.g., details: '#address-form' or details: 'form'), utilizing the plugin's automatic field mapping via name attributes

checklist.name: Draggable marker
checklist.description: Enables marker dragging by setting markerOptions.draggable to true in the geocomplete configuration

checklist.name: Drag event handling
checklist.description: Implements geocode:dragged event handler using .bind() or .on() to capture the new LatLng position when the marker is dragged, and updates the latitude and longitude form fields with the new coordinates

checklist.name: Reset button visibility
checklist.description: Shows the reset button within the geocode:dragged event handler (e.g., $('#reset-btn').show()) to indicate that the marker position has been manually adjusted

checklist.name: Reset functionality
checklist.description: Implements reset button click handler that calls the geocomplete resetMarker() method using the string-based API (e.g., $('#geocomplete').geocomplete('resetMarker')) to restore the marker to the original geocoded position

checklist.name: Reset button cleanup
checklist.description: Hides the reset button after calling resetMarker() or on successful geocode:result events to maintain proper UI state
